import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import './style.css' import './dropdown.css' const Form = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', phoneNumber: '', gender: '', state: '', }) const onChange = (e) => { const { value, name } = e.target; setForm((state) => ({ ...state, [name]: value })); } const showData = () => { console.log('Form :', form) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
